snippet.title: NEFASTO'S MISADVENTURE: Meeting Noeroze, official trailer (Pix'n Love Games x Aurora Game Studio)
snippet.description:
Pix'n Love Games and Aurora Game Studio are pleased to present their first original co-production: Nefasto's Misadventure! In this vibrant tribute to the point'n click genre, play Nefasto, a corrupted game data, stuck in the heart of a buggy computer! The system is about to crash and time is running out! Will you find a way out before being permanently erased from the program?

Early Access :
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1491660/Nefastos_Misadventure_Meeting_Noeroze/
